subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. suspended Memphis guard O. J. Mayo for 10 games after he tested positive for dehydroepiandrosterone, a banned steroid.
snippet: The N.B.A. suspended Memphis guard O. J. Mayo for 10 games after he tested positive for dehydroepiandrosterone, a banned steroid.
